title: Drawing, "Autumn, Lunette for Ceiling of the Sala Ottagonale, Palazzo Milzetti, Faenza", 1804–05
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and light brown wash over graphite on white laid paper
inscribed: Recto: inscribed in pen and brown ink: in autunno 1 equinozio in libra 21 9bre. Verso: inscribed in pen and brown ink: Commendatore Ripanti/ Mo Giacomo Ripanti/ M Gabriella Ripanti/ Sig Rafaello Compagnoli/ Colini/ Leopardi/ Cav Cansecrata/ Lo Sipione Baldasini/ po esiole/ maestro di lingua/ mae stro Antonio Belli.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Reclining winged putto grasping grape vine.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Autumn, Lunette for Ceiling of the Sala Ottagonale, Palazzo Milzetti, Faenza", 1804–05.
1804–05. Pen and brown ink, brush and light brown wash over graphite on white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1180.
